title: Mastercard wants to get rid of card numbers for online shopping
description: Mastercard Inc. aims to combat online payment fraud by expanding the use of token technology to replace credit card numbers and passwords with biometric data such as fingerprints and face scans. The company is processing 1 billion tokenized transactions weekly and plans to tokenize all e-commerce transactions in Europe by the decade's end.
